name: Ao oni 3d remake demo
description:
Story:You and your friends have went into the outskirts of town to investigate a haunted mansion. You and your friends have heard rumors of there being a monster that lives in the mansion. You and your friends have decided it would be a good idea to enter the mansion but be warned of the monster that roams the mansion have fun and try not to die! Good luck because you will need it! 

Controls: WASD to move

                       Shift to sprint

                      Press esc to access inventory and to save the game.

                     Number keys to interact

                     Tip: You can change the name but you have to click on the username box once then you press backspace to erase the name Hiroshi and then you can type in your own name.
